title: Tsunami Warning
message: High alert: Tsunami warning issued for coastal areas. Evacuate immediately to higher ground.

title: Heavy Rain Alert
message: Heavy rainfall expected in the next 2 hours. Stay indoors and avoid low-lying areas.

title: Shelter Update
message: New emergency shelter opened at Central Park with capacity for 200 people.

title: Flood Watch
message: River levels rising rapidly. Monitor local conditions and be prepared to evacuate.
